mapper.select: SELECT WA.WISH_NUMBER, WA.WISH_TITLE, WA.APPLY_STATUS, S.USER_NAME, WA.WISH_MONEY FROM USER S JOIN ( SELECT WA.WISH_NUMBER,WA.WISH_TITLE,WA.USER_ID,WA.APPLY_STATUS, WA.WISH_MONEY FROM SELLER S JOIN ( SELECT W.WISH_NUMBER, W.USER_ID, W.WISH_TITLE, W.WISH_MONEY, A.APPLY_STATUS FROM WISH W JOIN APPLY_STATUS A ON W.WISH_NUMBER = A.WISH_NUMBER WHERE A.APPLY_STATUS=0) AS WA WHERE WA.WISH_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', S.SELLER_AREA,'%') AND S.USER_ID=#{user_id} GROUP BY WA.WISH_NUMBER) WA ON WA.USER_ID = S.USER_ID;
SELECT * FROM BOARD B JOIN SELLER_BOARD S ON B.BOARD_NUMBER = S.BOARD_NUMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} AND BOARD_KIND = 1
